content: note this pattern is available for free on my blog try knitting this hooded cowl and you will not regret if you have difficulty to find a similar yarn use medium worsted weight yarn and check my gauge to compare **video tutorial ** https //youtu be/kesesrjrfdo you are welcome to follow my **youtube** channel https //www youtube com/channel/ucwqwxlyqk9vjedzoiqjw-wa **facebook** https //www facebook com/groups/crazyhands net/ **instagram ** https //www instagram com/amurushka_amur/
